QuestData.Title: Lupello
QuestData.Description: I've been thinking... the wolves might stop attacking if we kill their pack leader.$b$bWe call him Lupello, and he patrols the opposite riverbank.$b$b<Francis' concentration is broken by another attack. Perhaps you should go deal with Lupello yourself.>
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Leader of wolves, devourer of lambs.
QuestData.CompletionText: What will Master Shang say when he finds out?
QuestData.RewardText: I know I should be the one fighting them off. Maybe I'm not cut out for shepherding after all.
